title: BSC node becomes very slow 5 minutes after launch
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2021.11.3-alpha`

OS & Version:  CentOS 8.5.2111

Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour
Syncing BSC at a steady pace

#### Actual behaviour
Dropping to almost 0 blocks/second after 5 minutes

./erigon --chain bsc --datadir data

I think now better ask BSC questions here https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/3249
In any case - this issue has not enough info: 
- is it happening every time - and at any block number? Or you just saw it once?
- What is your hardware? Disk, RAM. 
- is it server or desktop? any other Disk/RAM-hungry processes on same machine?
